Hero.title: Karim Feki
Hero.subtitle: <accent>Software</accent> Developer
Hero.description: Software development student, passionate about computer science and aeronautics, I put my skills at the service of innovative solutions.

About.heading: About
About.title: Who am I ?
description: Software development student, I enjoy learning and exploring different technologies to create modern and efficient applications. My journey has allowed me to develop solid skills in this field.
Inspired by aeronautics, I appreciate rigor and precision in my work. I am always looking to improve and discover new technical approaches.
Currently looking for an apprenticeship in software development for September 2025, I am ready to take on new challenges and contribute to ambitious projects.

items.title: Internship - Web Developer
items.description: Development of responsive user interfaces with React and TypeScript. Collaboration with the design team to implement accurate mockups.

items.title: Bachelor in Web Development & Applications
items.description: Intensive training in software development and programming. Practical projects in teams and individually.

items.title: Internship - Web Design
items.description: Development of an online store with Next.js and Stripe.

items.title: General Baccalaureate
items.description: Obtained the general baccalaureate with specialties NSI and SES.

Contact.heading: Contact
Contact.paragraph: Do you have a project in mind or an opportunity to discuss? Don't hesitate to contact me!
